info.name: Blog API
info.description: REST API collection for Blog application with authentication, posts, and comments

request.description: Register a new user. User will receive an email verification link. User account will be inactive until email is verified.

response.name: Success

request.description: Verify user email address. Use the link sent to user's email after signup. Replace {{uidb64}} and {{token}} with values from the email.

response.name: Success

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns authentication token. Save the token for authenticated requests.

query.description: Optional: Filter posts by author ID

request.description: List all public posts and user's own private posts. Optional query parameter 'author' to filter by author ID.

response.name: Success
